name.en: Initiative, design, planning and execution of scientific education projects for remote schools (II)
name.ch: 偏鄉學校科學教案之發想、設計、規劃與執行(二)

goal.en: The goals of this course are: 1. To promote students‘ concern and understanding of rural education and students. 2. To enhance students‘ interaction with society. 3. To develop the ability to identify problems and design teaching plans. 4. To cultivate organizational skills, adaptability, teamwork, communication skills, and execution capability. 5. To foster a sense of social responsibility and citizenship to contribute to society.
goal.ch: 本課程的目標為 1. 促進學生關懷與了解偏鄉教育與學生 2. 增進學生與社會的互動 3. 建立發掘問題的能力與教案設計能力 4. 培養統籌組織能力、快捷變通能力、團隊運作能力、溝通能力與執行力 5. 養成取之社會用之社會的公民情懷

content.en:
Week 1: Introduction to the direction and objectives of the semester‘s course plan.
Week 2: How to tell a story.
Week 3: Overview of methods for teaching science to children.
Week 4: Execution methods and skills for camp activities.
Week 5: How to establish a (social or environmental) community.
Week 6: Corporate visits related to social (or environmental) responsibility.
Week 7: Sharing reflections on visits to social (or environmental) responsible businesses.
Week 8: Planning rural science teaching plans - Detailed planning (Part 1).
Week 9: Planning rural science teaching plans - Detailed planning (Part 2).
Week 10: Execution of rural science teaching plans - Preparations and communication (Part 1).
Week 11: Execution of rural science teaching plans - Preparations and communication (Part 2).
Week 12: Execution of rural science teaching plans - Implementation (Part 1).
Week 13: Execution of rural science teaching plans - Implementation (Part 2).
Week 14: Sharing reflections on the execution of rural science teaching plans (Part 1).
Week 15: Sharing reflections on the execution of rural science teaching plans (Part 2).
Week 16: Critique of the execution of rural science teaching plans.
Week 17: Further evolution of rural science teaching plans.
Week 18: End-of-semester celebration.
content.ch:
第一周：本學期課程計畫方向與目標之介紹
第二周：如何說故事
第三周：學童科學教育方法概論
第四周：營隊活動執行方式與技巧
第五周：如何建立社會(或環保)
第六周：企業社會(或環保)企業參訪
第七周：社會(或環保)企業參訪心得分享
第八周：偏鄉科學教案之規劃--細部規劃(1)
第九周：偏鄉科學教案之規劃--細部規劃(2)
第十周：偏鄉科學教案之執行--行前準備與溝通(1)
第十一周：偏鄉科學教案之執行--行前準備與溝通(2)
第十二周：偏鄉科學教案之執行--教案執行(1)
第十三周：偏鄉科學教案之執行--教案執行(2)
第十四周：偏鄉科學教案執行之心得分享(1)
第十五周：偏鄉科學教案執行之心得分享(2)
第十六周：偏鄉科學教案執行之評析
第十七周：偏鄉科學教案再進化
第十八周：期末慶賀
